sources.title: Patrick (1978)
sources.description: A man in a coma has a way of killing using telekinesis and manipulates the life of others

sources.title: Patrick (1978)
sources.description: A comatose hospital patient harasses and kills though his powers of telekinesis to claim his private nurse as his own. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/patrick-1978/

metadata.Plot: After the shocking bathtub death of his mother and her lover, the sinister Patrick lays comatose in a small private hospital, his only action being his involuntary spitting. When a pretty young nurse, just separated from her husband, begins work at the hospital, she senses that Patrick is communicating with her, and he seems to be using his psychic powers to manipulate events in her life.
metadata.Actors: Susan Penhaligon, Robert Helpmann, Rod Mullinar
